In Appendix A, we describe how to construct unidimensional Smolyak grid points and basis functions. In Appendix B, we develop the formula for the Smolyak interpolant in the two-dimensional example with = 2. In Appendix C, we show an example of constructing adaptive domain. Finally, in Appendix D, we describe the multicontry model and the solution algorithm.
